title: Remittances
context: §251-5 Remittances. All remittances of surcharge taxes imposed under this chapter shall be made by cash, bank draft, cashier&rsquo;s check, money order, or certificate of deposit to the office of the taxation district to which the return was transmitted. The department shall deposit the moneys into the state treasury to the credit of the state highway fund. [L 1991, c 263, pt of §1; am L 2011, c 104, §§4, 8]
